item.strangematter.echoform_imprinter.to: A device that scans mobs and allows you to morph into them. Right-click on a mob to scan, shift right-click to morph back.
item.strangematter.warp_gun.tooltip: Right-click to shoot a projectile that creates temporary mini warp gates.
item.strangematter.chrono_blister.toolti: Right-click to shoot a projectile that spawns time dilation blocks, slowing all movement through them.
item.strangematter.tinfoil_hat.tooltip: Protects from energetic rift electric sparks and thoughtwell nausea effects.
item.strangematter.gravitic_shard.toolti: A crystallized fragment of gravitational anomaly energy. Pulses with strange gravitational forces.
item.strangematter.chrono_shard.tooltip: A temporal crystal that seems to exist in multiple moments simultaneously. Time flows strangely around it.
item.strangematter.spatial_shard.tooltip: A dimensional fragment that bends space around itself. Reality seems to warp in its presence.
item.strangematter.shade_shard.tooltip: A shadowy crystal that seems to absorb light. It exists in a state between reality and void.
item.strangematter.insight_shard.tooltip: A cognitive crystal that enhances mental perception. Looking at it makes your thoughts feel clearer.
item.strangematter.energetic_shard.toolt: A vibrant crystal pulsing with raw energy. It crackles with electrical potential.
item.strangematter.research_tablet.toolt: A mysterious device for organizing and viewing research data. Right-click to open the research interface.
advancements.strangematter.root.title: Strange Matter
advancements.strangematter.root.descript: Discover the mysteries of reality-bending anomalies
advancements.strangematter.first_contact: Experience the effects of an anomaly for the first time
advancements.strangematter.the_researche: Complete your first research project to obtain Research Notes
advancements.strangematter.anomaly_colle: Scan all six types of anomalies: Gravity, Temporal, Spatial, Energy, Shadow, and Cognitive
advancements.strangematter.energy_harves: Craft a Resonance Condenser to harvest energy from anomalies
advancements.strangematter.field_researc: Craft your first Field Scanner to detect and analyze anomalies
advancements.strangematter.anomaly_hunte: Craft an Anomaly Resonator to locate anomalies from a distance
advancements.strangematter.reality_extra: Craft an Echo Vacuum to extract anomalies from the world
advancements.strangematter.portal_master: Craft a Warp Gun to create teleportation gates
advancements.strangematter.reality_forge: Craft a Reality Forge to perform advanced anomalous crafting
advancements.strangematter.knowledge_see: Complete research in all six anomaly categories to unlock advanced tools
advancements.strangematter.research_mast: Craft a Research Machine to access the complete research tree
advancements.strangematter.anomaly_tamer: Capture an anomaly in a Containment Capsule
An advanced device that can extract and condense anomaly energy into crystallized shards. Place near anomalies to begin the absorption process.
block.strangematter.resonant_burner.tool: A powerful energy generator that burns fuel to produce resonance energy. Can accept any furnace fuel and outputs energy to adjacent machines.
block.strangematter.reality_forge.toolti: An advanced crafting machine that uses anomalous shards to create powerful items. Insert shards and place items in the crafting grid to begin.
gui.strangematter.research_machine.title: Research Machine
gui.strangematter.reality_forge.title: Reality Forge
gui.strangematter.research_machine.inser: Insert research notes to start research
research.strangematter.research.name: Research
research.strangematter.research.descript: Introduction to the research machine and how to unlock new technologies through anomaly study.
research.strangematter.field_scanner.des: A handheld device for detecting and analyzing anomalies in the field.
research.strangematter.anomaly_resonator: An advanced compass-like device that points toward nearby anomalies and allows synchronization.

BREAKTHROUGH! My most
advanced detection device!
This compass locates
anomalies and syncs with
their energy signatures.

Unlike the Field Scanner,
the Resonator provides
precise directional
guidance and resonance
links with anomalies.

Construct with materials
shown in recipe.

The Resonator operates on advanced resonant detection:

• Compass needle points to nearest anomalies
• Synchronization mode creates energy links
• Tracks multiple anomaly sources

Usage:

1. Hold and observe needle direction
2. Follow needle to locate sources
3. Right-click near anomalies to sync
4. Monitor readings for type identification
5. Use data for research projects
research.strangematter.anomaly_shards.de: Understanding the different types of anomaly shards and their generation in the world.
research.strangematter.anomaly_types.des: Comprehensive understanding of the six fundamental types of anomalies and their properties.
research.strangematter.anomaly_types.int:
EUREKA! After years of meticulous study, I have identified the six fundamental types of anomaly phenomena that permeate our reality! Each type represents a different aspect of dimensional instability, and understanding their properties is crucial to mastering anomaly science.

These six types form the foundation of all anomaly research. Every strange occurrence, every dimensional rift, every temporal distortion can be classified into one of these fundamental categories. They are the building blocks of reality itself, twisted and warped by forces beyond normal comprehension!

Mastering these types opens the door to advanced anomaly manipulation and containment techniques.
research.strangematter.anomaly_types.fun:
The six fundamental anomaly types I have catalogued:

• GRAVITY: Distorts gravitational fields, causes floating objects and anti-gravity zones
• TIME: Manipulates temporal flow, creates time loops and temporal echoes
• SPACE: Warps dimensional space, creates teleportation effects
• ENERGY: Disrupts electromagnetic fields, causes energy storms
• SHADOW: Creates dimensional voids and shadow portals
• COGNITION: Affects mental perception, causes hallucinations and thought-forms
research.strangematter.anomaly_types.int:
FASCINATING DISCOVERY! The anomaly types interact in complex ways:

• Gravity + Space = Dimensional rifts to other realities
• Time + Energy = Temporal energy storms
• Shadow + Cognition = Shadow entities
• Space + Time = Warp gates for instant travel
• Gravity + Energy = Gravitational energy wells
• Cognition + Time = Memory loops across timelines

Understanding these interactions is key to creating stable containment systems and advanced research equipment!
research.strangematter.anomaly_types.app:
The practical applications of anomaly type knowledge:

• GRAVITY: Anti-gravity technology and energy generation
• TIME: Temporal research facilities and time-dilated chambers
• SPACE: Teleportation networks and dimensional storage
• ENERGY: Unlimited power sources and electromagnetic weapons
• SHADOW: Dimensional travel and stealth technology
• COGNITION: Mind-machine interfaces and enhanced learning

Each type requires specialized equipment and containment procedures. This knowledge is the foundation of all advanced anomaly technology!
research.strangematter.resonite.name: Resonite
research.strangematter.resonite.descript: The fundamental energy source derived from anomalies. Learn to collect and process resonite ore.
research.strangematter.resonite.intro.co:
FASCINATING DISCOVERY! This
crystalline ore is the key
to unlocking anomaly
energy!

Resonite spawns naturally
in the world, but is most
easily found underneath
anomalies where reality
becomes thin.

This precious material
holds the power to
channel and amplify
anomaly frequencies!
research.strangematter.resonite.coil.con:
My first breakthrough in
resonite applications!

The Resonant Coil is a
fundamental component
that can channel and
amplify anomaly energy.

It serves as the
foundation for more
complex devices and
can be used to create
resonance circuits.
BREAKTHROUGH ACHIEVEMENT!
The Resonant Circuit
represents the pinnacle
of resonite technology!

This advanced component
can process multiple
anomaly frequencies
simultaneously and
stabilize complex
energy patterns.

Essential for advanced
research equipment!
research.strangematter.resonance_condens: An advanced machine that condenses anomaly energy into crystallized shards for advanced crafting.

The Resonance Condenser
represents a breakthrough
in anomaly energy
manipulation.

This advanced device
condenses the energies
from nearby anomalies
in a sped-up manner to
form anomaly shards
through accelerated
crystallization.

It dramatically reduces
the time required for
shard formation.

The condenser operates
by creating a localized
resonance field that
amplifies the natural
crystallization process.

When placed near active
anomalies, it draws in
ambient anomaly energy
and accelerates the
formation of shards
beneath the anomaly.

The process is
significantly faster
than natural formation
but requires precise
calibration.
research.strangematter.containment_basic:
BREAKTHROUGH! At last I
have developed the
fundamental tools for
anomaly containment!

The Echo Vacuum is my
most sophisticated
device for capturing
and containing
anomalous entities.

This revolutionary
tool can safely
contain anomalies
for further study
and analysis.

The containment capsule
represents the pinnacle
of anomaly containment
technology.

These specialized
containers can safely
hold captured anomalies
for extended periods
without degradation.

Essential for
transporting and
storing anomalous
entities for detailed
scientific analysis.
research.strangematter.warp_gun.intro.co:
REVOLUTIONARY DISCOVERY!
I have created the
ultimate portable
teleportation device!

The Warp Gun allows
instantaneous travel
through personal warp
gates that I can
create anywhere.

This breakthrough
represents the
pinnacle of spatial
anomaly manipulation!
research.strangematter.warp_gun.mechanic:
The Warp Gun operates through paired spatial anomalies that create stable wormholes.

Left click fires a primary warp gate that anchors to the target location.

Right click fires a secondary warp gate that connects to the primary.

You can then teleport instantly between the two gates!
research.strangematter.chrono_blister.in:
BREAKTHROUGH IN TEMPORAL
MANIPULATION!

I have successfully
harnessed temporal
anomaly energy to
create a device that
can slow time itself!

The Chrono Blister
fires projectiles that
spawn fields of time
dilation, creating
zones where all
movement slows
proportionally.
research.strangematter.chrono_blister.me:
The Chrono Blister creates time dilation blocks that slow all movement uniformly.

When a projectile hits, it spawns a blob of time dilation blocks in a small radius.

These blocks are walkable-through but slow ALL movement - including gravity, horizontal movement, and projectiles.

Arrows still land in the same place, they just take longer to get there.

The blocks slowly decay over time, eventually disappearing like leaves.
research.strangematter.tinfoil_hat.name: Tinfoil Hat
research.strangematter.tinfoil_hat.descr: A protective helmet crafted from resonite that shields the mind from cognitive anomalies and deflects electrical energy.
research.strangematter.tinfoil_hat.intro:
The Tinfoil Hat is a unique piece of protective equipment crafted from resonite ingots. When worn, it provides protection against two specific anomaly effects:

• Energetic Rift Electric Sparks: The hat's conductive properties redirect electrical energy, preventing damage from energetic rifts.

• Thoughtwell Nausea: The resonite material creates a cognitive barrier that shields the wearer's mind from the disorienting effects of thoughtwells.

The hat provides minimal physical protection (1 armor point) but excels at protecting against these specific anomaly hazards.
research.strangematter.tinfoil_hat.recip: The Tinfoil Hat is crafted using 5 resonite ingots arranged in a helmet pattern in a standard crafting table:
EXTRAORDINARY BREAKTHROUGH!
I have achieved what I
thought impossible - the
complete suspension of
matter in space-time!

By combining gravitational
field manipulation with
temporal distortion, I
have created a device
that can FREEZE objects
in a localized stasis
field!

The Stasis Projector
represents the pinnacle
of gravitational and
temporal anomaly
control technology!

The Stasis Projector operates on a revolutionary principle:

By creating a localized gravitational well combined with temporal distortion, objects within the field experience ZERO time flow while maintaining physical presence!

Shift right-click to activate/deactivate the field.

When active:
• Captures one item OR entity within range
• Suspends target above projector
• Prevents item pickup and entity AI
• Items never despawn
• Mobs cannot attack or move

Perfect for displaying rare artifacts or containing dangerous specimens!

The applications of this technology are LIMITLESS!

MUSEUM DISPLAYS: Showcase rare items in suspended animation with no risk of theft or decay! The stasis field keeps artifacts perfectly preserved and visible.

SPECIMEN CONTAINMENT: Safely contain dangerous mobs for study without risk of escape or aggression!
research.strangematter.rift_stabilizer.i:
EUREKA! UNPRECEDENTED
BREAKTHROUGH!

I have achieved DIRECT
energy extraction from
Energetic Rift anomalies!

The Rift Stabilizer
creates a resonance
field that SIPHONS raw
anomaly energy and
converts it into stable,
usable power!

No fuel! No combustion!
Just pure, limitless
energy drawn from the
very fabric of reality
itself!
research.strangematter.rift_stabilizer.m:
The Rift Stabilizer operates on revolutionary principles I've discovered through years of study!

By creating a focused resonance field pointed directly at an Energetic Rift, the device establishes a stable energy channel - a brilliant lightning bridge of pure anomaly power!

CRITICAL OPERATIONAL REQUIREMENTS:
• Must be within range of Energetic Rift
• Front face MUST point toward the rift
• Each rift supports limited stabilizers
• Generates constant power every tick
• Energy output through back face only

The visible electrical beam confirms proper alignment and active power generation!
research.strangematter.rift_stabilizer.u:
INSTALLATION PROTOCOLS FOR OPTIMAL RESULTS:

1. Locate an active Energetic Rift anomaly
2. Place stabilizer within detection range
3. FRONT FACE (intake) must point at rift!
4. BACK FACE (output) connects to machines

When properly aligned, you'll witness a magnificent electrical beam connecting the rift directly to the stabilizer!

Right-click the block to check current power generation status and stored energy levels.

The device requires NO fuel and operates continuously as long as the rift remains active and within range!
research.strangematter.levitation_pad.de: An advanced device that creates controlled levitation fields for safe transportation and anti-gravity applications.
research.strangematter.levitation_pad.in:
REVOLUTIONARY BREAKTHROUGH!
I have mastered the art
of controlled levitation!

The Levitation Pad
creates a powerful
anti-gravity field that
can lift players,
mobs, and items
up to 16 blocks high!

This device represents
the pinnacle of
gravitational anomaly
manipulation technology!
research.strangematter.levitation_pad.me:
The Levitation Pad operates through advanced gravitational field manipulation:

UP MODE (Default):
• Lifts entities upward within 16 blocks
• Stops at first solid block encountered
• Prevents fall damage during descent
• Works on players, mobs, and items

DOWN MODE (Right-click to toggle):
• Slowly lowers entities to ground level
• Provides controlled descent
• Eliminates fall damage completely
• Perfect for safe transportation

The visible levitation beam shows the active field range and current mode.
research.strangematter.gravity_anomalies:
FASCINATING! Gravity
anomalies represent
localized distortions
in the gravitational
field.

These entities manifest
as floating geometric
shapes that rotate
continuously, creating
pockets of altered
gravity.

They can affect
nearby entities and
terrain, making them
valuable for research
into spatial
manipulation.
research.strangematter.temporal_anomalie:
BREAKTHROUGH! Temporal
anomalies are rare
manifestations of
time distortion
phenomena.

These temporal blooms
create localized
regions where time
flows differently,
allowing for
accelerated or
slowed processes.

They represent the
ultimate frontier in
anomaly research -
the manipulation of
time itself!
research.strangematter.spatial_anomalies:
REVOLUTIONARY! Spatial
anomalies manifest as
warp gates that create
stable wormholes
between locations.

These warp gate
anomalies can connect
distant points in
space, enabling
instantaneous
travel.

They represent the
pinnacle of spatial
manipulation
technology and are
essential for advanced
teleportation systems.
INCREDIBLE! Energy
anomalies manifest as
energetic rifts that
channel raw anomaly
energy.

These rifts create
localized energy
fields that can
power advanced
technology or
provide research
opportunities.

They are the key to
understanding how
to harness anomaly
energy for practical
applications.
MYSTERIOUS! Shadow
anomalies take the
form of echoing
shadows that seem
to exist between
realities.

These entities create
localized regions
of shadow energy
that can affect
visibility and
perception.

They represent the
most enigmatic type
of anomaly and
require careful
study to understand
their properties.
research.strangematter.cognitive_anomali:
ASTOUNDING! Cognitive
anomalies manifest as
thoughtwells that
channel mental
energies.

These entities create
localized regions
where thoughts and
memories can be
amplified or
manipulated.

They represent the
intersection between
anomaly physics
and consciousness,
opening new
possibilities for
mind-machine
interfaces.
research.strangematter.resonant_energy.d: Understanding resonant power systems and the Resonant Burner for generating energy from fuel.
research.strangematter.resonant_energy.i:
The discovery of resonant energy has revolutionized my understanding of anomaly-based power generation.

This form of energy harnesses the natural frequencies present in anomaly phenomena to create stable, usable power.

It represents the foundation for all advanced anomaly technology.
research.strangematter.resonant_energy.b:
The Resonant Burner is
my first practical
application of resonant
energy principles.

This device converts
conventional fuel into
resonant energy through
careful frequency
modulation and
stabilization.

While primitive compared
to future machines, it
paves the way for the
advanced power systems
needed for anomalous
energy generation.
research.strangematter.containment_basic: Fundamental principles of anomaly containment using Echo Vacuum and Containment Capsules.
research.strangematter.echoform_imprinte: A revolutionary device that scans and mimics the physical forms of living entities through shadow-cognitive resonance.

UNPRECEDENTED BREAKTHROUGH!
I have done the IMPOSSIBLE!

The Echoform Imprinter
scans a living being's
echoform - their shadow-
cognitive imprint!

I can TEMPORARILY mimic
their physical form!

The scientific potential
is EXTRAORDINARY!

Operating the Echoform Imprinter requires precise technique:

TO SCAN:
Hold right-click on any creature for ONE SECOND.

TO REVERT:
Shift + right-click to return to normal.

FEATURES:
• Works on ANY living entity
• Scan PLAYERS to copy appearance
• Perfect mimicry with animations
• Completely reversible

Ideal for infiltration and research!

Every entity casts TWO imprints:

PHYSICAL SHADOW:
Cast by blocking light.

COGNITIVE ECHOFORM:
A PERFECT template of physical structure in reality itself!

APPLICATIONS:
• Infiltration and espionage
• Understanding alien biology
• Deception and disguise
• Safe anomaly interaction

The implications are STAGGERING!
research.strangematter.reality_forge.des: The ultimate crafting machine that uses anomaly shards to create powerful and exotic items.
research.strangematter.reality_forge_cat: The ultimate crafting machine that uses anomaly shards to create powerful and exotic items.
research.strangematter.reality_forge.int:
The Reality Forge represents
the pinnacle of anomaly
manipulation technology.

This remarkable device
infuses normal items with
the concentrated energy
from anomaly shards,
transforming them into
powerful anomalous
artifacts.

Through careful
frequency alignment, it
can channel the unique
properties of each
anomaly type into
ordinary materials.
research.strangematter.reality_forge.usa:
The Reality Forge operates
on principles of resonant
frequency manipulation.

Place your target item
in the main slot, then
select the appropriate
anomaly shard type.

The forge will carefully
infuse the item with
anomaly energy, creating
new properties and
capabilities.

Each shard type produces
different effects on the
infused item.
research.strangematter.warp_gun.name: Warp Gun
research.strangematter.warp_gun.descript: A powerful weapon that shoots projectiles creating temporary mini warp gates.
research.strangematter.chrono_blister.de: A temporal gadget that shoots projectiles spawning time dilation blocks, slowing all movement through them.
An advanced device that manipulates gravitational and temporal fields to suspend objects in a frozen state.
research.strangematter.rift_stabilizer.d: A revolutionary power generation device that harnesses raw energy directly from Energetic Rift anomalies.
research.strangematter.gravity_anomalies: In-depth study of gravitational anomalies and their unique physics-defying properties.
research.strangematter.temporal_anomalie: Advanced research into temporal distortions and time-based anomaly phenomena.
research.strangematter.spatial_anomalies: Understanding spatial distortions, dimensional rifts, and reality-bending anomalies.
Study of energetic rifts and electrical anomaly phenomena that crackle with raw power.
Research into shadow-based anomalies and dimensional void phenomena.
research.strangematter.cognitive_anomali: Understanding thoughtwells and anomaly phenomena that affect mental perception and cognition.
Anomalies are mysterious phenomena that appear throughout the world. These strange occurrences can be studied and understood through careful observation and analysis.

By researching anomalies, you can unlock new technologies and gain deeper insights into the nature of reality itself.

This foundation research provides the basic tools and knowledge needed to begin your journey into anomaly study.
There are six fundamental types of research points that can be gained from studying anomalies:

• Cognition: Mental and perception-based phenomena
• Energy: Power and electrical anomalies
• Gravity: Gravitational distortions and effects
• Shadow: Dimensional and shadow-based anomalies
• Space: Spatial distortions and portals
• Time: Temporal anomalies and time-based effects

Each anomaly type produces different research points when studied. Understanding these categories is essential for advancing your research.
research.strangematter.foundation.scanne:
The Field Scanner is your primary tool for detecting and analyzing anomalies. This handheld device can identify anomaly types and provide detailed readings.

To craft a Field Scanner, you'll need basic materials and some anomalous components. Once constructed, simply right-click while holding the scanner to begin analyzing nearby anomalies.

To use the Field Scanner effectively:

1. Hold the scanner in your hand
2. Right-click while looking at an anomaly
3. The scanner will analyze the anomaly and provide readings
4. Research points will be automatically added

Different anomalies provide different amounts and types of research points. Some anomalies are more powerful and will yield greater rewards, but may also be more dangerous to approach.
research.strangematter.resonator.intro.c:
The Anomaly Resonator is an advanced device that can detect and interact with anomalies at a much greater distance than basic scanners. This powerful tool not only points you toward nearby anomalies but also allows you to synchronize with them.

Unlike simple scanners, the resonator creates a resonance field that extends far beyond visual range, making it essential for large-scale anomaly detection and management.
research.strangematter.resonator.mechani:
The Anomaly Resonator operates on advanced resonance principles:

• Detection Range: 64 block radius for initial anomaly detection
• Directional Guidance: Points directly toward the nearest anomaly
• Synchronization: Allows you to 'sync' with specific anomalies
• Filtering: Once synced, anomalies won't trigger new detections

The resonator uses resonite technology to maintain stable connections with anomalies over extended periods, making it perfect for long-term monitoring.
To craft an Anomaly Resonator, you'll need advanced materials that can handle the resonance frequencies required for long-range detection.

The resonator requires resonite ingots for its core structure and amethyst shards for the resonance amplifier.
research.strangematter.resonator.usage.c:
To use the Anomaly Resonator effectively:

1. Hold the resonator in your hand
2. Right-click to activate resonance scanning
3. Follow the directional indicator to locate anomalies
4. Right-click on an anomaly to synchronize with it
5. Synced anomalies will be filtered from future detections

Tips for Effective Use:
• Sync with common anomalies you don't want to track
• Use with field scanners for detailed analysis
research.strangematter.research.intro.co:
The Research Machine is your gateway to unlocking new technologies and understanding the strange anomalies that appear throughout the world.

By studying anomalies and completing research, you can gain access to powerful tools, advanced machines, and exotic materials that defy normal physics.

This research will teach you the fundamentals of using the research system and guide you through your journey into anomaly study.
research.strangematter.research.field_sc:
The Field Scanner is your primary tool for detecting and analyzing anomalies.

To use: Hold it and right-click while looking at an anomaly. The scanner will analyze it and automatically add research points to your tablet!

Different anomalies provide different types and amounts of research points based on their nature and power level.
research.strangematter.research.research:
The Research Tablet tracks your accumulated research points and unlocked technologies.

Right-click while holding it to open the research interface and view all available research nodes.

Click any locked node to view its requirements. If you have enough points, spend them to receive research notes for that technology!
research.strangematter.research.machine_:
To use the Research
Machine:

1. Place research notes
   in the machine's
   input slot
2. Click 'Begin
   Research' to start
   the process
3. Complete the
   minigames that
   appear to stabilize
   the research
4. Successfully
   completing research
   unlocks new
   technologies
research.strangematter.research.minigame:
During research,
you'll encounter
various minigames
that represent
stabilizing different
types of anomaly
energy:

• Energy: Adjust waves
• Cognition: Memorize
• Space: Correct space
• Gravity: Balance
• Time: Synchronize
• Shadow: Align

Each minigame becomes
unstable over time.
research.strangematter.research.instabil:
Instability is a critical
concept in anomaly study:

• All minigames stable:
  Instability decreases
• Any minigame unstable:
  Instability increases

If the experiment becomes
too unstable then the
research fails.
Reduce instability to zero
to successfully complete
the research.
research.strangematter.field_scanner.int:
The Field Scanner is an
essential tool for
detecting and analyzing
anomaly phenomena in the
world around you.

This handheld device can
identify different types
of anomalies and provide
valuable data for your
research.
research.strangematter.anomaly_shards.in:
FASCINATING! These
crystalline formations
are the physical
manifestation of
anomaly energy!

Each shard contains
pure, concentrated
anomaly essence that
can be harvested and
studied. They form
beneath active
anomalies like
crystalline tears
in reality itself!
research.strangematter.anomaly_shards.fo:
My research has revealed that anomaly shards form through a process I call 'Reality Crystallization'!

When anomalies remain active in an area, their energy seeps into the rock below, slowly crystallizing into pure anomaly matter.

It's like watching reality itself crystallize!
research.strangematter.anomaly_shards.ca:
Each type of anomaly produces its own unique shard variety:

• Gravitics: Red-orange gravity-distorting crystals
• Chrono: Golden yellow time-frozen gems
• Spatial: Blue dimension-bending shards
• Energetic: Cyan blue energy-condensed crystals
• Shade: Purple shadow-crystallized matter
• Insight: Green thought-crystallized fragments
research.strangematter.anomaly_shards.co:
To harvest these precious specimens:

1. Locate active anomalies
2. Dig down beneath the anomaly site
3. Look for crystallized deposits in the rock
4. Mine carefully - these are delicate specimens!

Each shard type has unique properties that make them valuable for advanced research.
research.strangematter.event.temporal_di: Time becomes unstable around the research machine!
research.strangematter.event.reality_fra: Reality tears near the research machine!
research.strangematter.cannot_afford: You don't have enough research points to unlock this research.
research.strangematter.inventory_full: Your inventory is full! Cannot receive research notes.
block.strangematter.research_machine.not: Research note inserted into the machine.
block.strangematter.research_machine.alr: The research machine already has a research note inserted.
block.strangematter.research_machine.res: Research failed due to anomalous interference!
gui.strangematter.research_machine.inser: Insert a research note to begin
block.strangematter.rift_stabilizer.not_: Not generating power (No Energetic Rift nearby or too many stabilizers) | Stored: %d/%d %s
block.strangematter.stasis_projector.too: A device that projects a stasis field to suspend items and entities in time. Shift right-click to toggle on/off. Right-click with dye to change field color.
item.strangematter.echo_vacuum.tooltip: A device that can contain anomalies in special capsules. Right-click to activate the vacuum beam.
item.strangematter.echo_vacuum.no_capsul: You need an empty containment capsule to use the Echo Vacuum!
item.strangematter.containment_capsule.e: An empty capsule for containing anomalies. Use with the Echo Vacuum.
item.strangematter.containment_capsule_g: Contains the essence of a gravitational anomaly. Pulses with strange forces.
item.strangematter.containment_capsule_e: Contains the essence of an energetic rift. Crackles with electrical energy.
Contains the essence of an echoing shadow. Dark energy swirls within.
item.strangematter.containment_capsule_t: Contains the essence of a temporal bloom. Time seems to flow strangely around it.
Contains the essence of a thoughtwell. Enhances mental perception.
item.strangematter.containment_capsule_w: Contains the essence of a warp gate anomaly. Reality bends around it.
item.strangematter.graviton_hammer.toolt: A powerful mining tool that manipulates gravity to mine in 3x3 areas and create charged tunnels.
research.strangematter.graviton_hammer.d: A powerful mining tool that manipulates gravitational forces to mine in 3x3 areas and create charged tunnels. Left-click for area mining, right-click and hold to charge up for tunnel mining.
research.strangematter.graviton_hammer.i:
After months of research
into gravitational
anomaly manipulation,
I have finally created
the ultimate mining
tool.

The Graviton Hammer
harnesses gravitational
fields to mine in
3x3 patterns, making
it incredibly efficient
for large-scale
excavation.
research.strangematter.graviton_hammer.m:
The Graviton Hammer operates through two distinct modes:

• Left-click mining creates 3x3 patterns. The orientation depends on the block face - horizontal planes for top/bottom faces, perpendicular planes for cardinal faces.

• Right-click charging accumulates gravitational energy. The longer I hold, the deeper the resulting tunnel becomes.

Three charge levels provide increasingly powerful tunnel mining. The tool has infinite durability, cannot be enchanted, but equals diamond mining level with iron pickaxe speed.
research.strangematter.hoverboard.name: Hoverboard
research.strangematter.hoverboard.descri: A personal transportation device that hovers above the ground using anti-gravity technology.
BREAKTHROUGH! I have created
the ultimate personal
transportation device!

The Hoverboard uses
advanced anti-gravity
technology to hover
smoothly above any
surface.

This revolutionary
vehicle provides
unprecedented mobility
and freedom of
travel across any
type of terrain!
jei.strangematter.reality_forge.info: The Reality Forge is a powerful machine that can craft items using anomaly shards. It requires specific materials and anomaly shards to function. Use it to create advanced Strange Matter items.
jei.strangematter.resonance_condenser.in: The Resonance Condenser is a specialized machine that processes anomaly energy. It crystallizes the energy of nearby anomalies into shards.
jei.strangematter.research_notes.info: Research Notes are obtained by completing research projects in the Research Tablet. Right-click with a Research Tablet to open the research interface, accumulate research points by scanning anomalies, then spend those points to unlock technologies and receive Research Notes.
jei.strangematter.learn_in_research_tabl: Learn this recipe in the Research Tablet.
